name: 5-Min Pin-Bar Volume Reversal Futures
description: Intraday price-action strategy for the CME E-mini S&P 500 (ES) futures that trades 5-minute bullish/bearish pin-bar reversals occurring at local swing lows/highs, confirmed by ≥1.5× 20-bar average volume. Positions risk 0.5 % of account equity, with a stop 0.5 % beyond the pin-bar extreme and profit target set at 2 × risk. Moderate-risk, non-overlapping with other systems.
